tools.name: list_sandbox_files
tools.description: List all files in the sandbox directory. No input needed.

tools.name: create_text_file
tools.description: Create a NEW text file in the sandbox. Use format: filename|||content

filename_and_content.description: Filename and content separated by '|||'. Example: 'response.txt|||This is the content of the file'

tools.name: update_text_file
tools.description: Update/modify an existing text file in the sandbox. Format: filename|||new_content

filename_and_content.description: Filename and content separated by '|||'. Format: filename|||new_content

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: Read a text file from the sandbox. If no filename provided, list available files.

filename.description: The filename to read. If empty, lists available files.

tools.name: Calculator
tools.description: Perform mathematical calculations and solve math problems

question.description: The mathematical question or expression to solve

tools.name: check_domain_allowed
tools.description: Check if a domain is allowed based on the current domain filter configuration

tools.name: get_domain_filter_status
tools.description: Get the current status and statistics of the domain filter

tools.name: list_allowed_domains
tools.description: List all explicitly allowed domains from the domain filter

tools.name: list_denied_domains
tools.description: List all explicitly denied domains from the domain filter

tools.name: reload_domain_filter_config
tools.description: Reload the domain filter configuration from files

tools.name: validate_url_for_access
tools.description: Validate a URL to check if its domain is allowed for internet access

categories.file_system: Tools for file operations in the sandbox environment
categories.internet: Tools for safe internet access and web operations
